body.name: GOTHAM STEEL 5.5 Qt Saute Pan with Lid Nonstick – 12 Inch Nonstick Skillet with Lid, Large Nonstick Deep Frying Pan for Cooking, Nonstick Skillet, Ceramic Pan, Dishwasher and Oven Safe, Cream White

features: Durable Stainless Steel Handle: The handle is made of stainless steel for a sturdy grip and easy use.
Non-Stick Ceramic Coating: The pan has a non-stick ceramic coating that prevents food from sticking for easy cleaning.
Oven and Stovetop Safe: This pan is oven safe up to 400°F and can be used on the stovetop for cooking.
Large 5.5 Quart Capacity: With a 5.5 quart capacity, this pan is great for cooking large meals or batch cooking.
Dishwasher Safe: The pan is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning after cooking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This pan is lovely and we cook so much in it!
reviews.reviewText: I love, love, love the color of this pan, and the weight of it is not too light and not too heavy. So far nothing sticks to it and I’ve been using it for about a month and a half. It’s a great size and easy to clean. Yes, the underside will discolor at some point from your burner but I expected that when I bought it. I mean it’s a light colored pan so it’s a trade off for having a lovely cooking surface on top. They could opt to make these with all dark colored bottoms but really it doesn’t bother me since the rest of the pan functions as it should and looks beautiful. What guest really needs to be looking at the underside of my pan anyway?? We will see how the nonstick surface holds up over time though. That’s why I didn’t buy a whole set of these yet, because I want to see how long they last before I dive in lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holy cow poop
reviews.reviewText: Never ever in my life have I had pots and pans like this!!!! Absolutely AMAZING!!!!! I’ll be 100% honest & tell you because of my disabilities, I don’t always wash dishes after dinner. Sometimes it’s a morning job. And every time, anything left in pot comes right off. Nothing has EVER stuck to these pans. I got these for my roommate for Christmas, but I use them more. :).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing pan, big enough for stew and frying chicken!
reviews.reviewText: You can literally burn something in this pan and it virtually just needs a quick wipe down to clean up!The lid is well fitting and does not drip steam onto the exterior, nice flat surface that gives you nice round pancakes, does a roux in a snap and you can have perfect steaks seared on the stove and finished in the oven. A great gift for the cooks in your family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gotham Steel 20 Pc Cookware Set Transforms My Kitchen Experience
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my kitchen with the Gotham Steel 20 Pc Pots and Pans Set in Cream White, and it's been a transformative experience. The set's non-stick ceramic coating is truly exceptional, making both cooking and cleaning a breeze. I've cooked a variety of dishes, and nothing sticks to these pans, maintaining their pristine look and feel. The lightweight design is a significant plus, making it easy to handle the pots and pans even when they're full. The cream white color adds a touch of elegance to my kitchen, and I've received numerous compliments on the set's aesthetic. The durability seems promising, as I've used them frequently without any signs of wear. The set is also dishwasher safe, which is a huge convenience. While I've only been using them for a short while and can't speak to their long-term performance, my current experience has been very positive. This cookware set is a great choice for anyone looking to combine style, functionality, and ease of use in their cooking routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for us! It’s hard to burn my food. I enjoy cooking again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Big and lightweight. Finally, I have a big pan I can lift with one hand. It's non-stick and easy to clean.It's the perfect pan for large meals.Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Is there a non stick pan that actually lasts?
reviews.reviewText: Not this one, excellent when you first start using it. Seasoned the pan and first week it was amazing. Center of pan seems to peak and liquids go toward edges but did not bother me. Center of pan no longer works as non stick, more like insta stick now and it’s only a month old. Week later and throwing it away, wife said change rating from 2-1 saying one of the worst we have owned
